resources.string: For this app to work, it must be excluded from Android\'s battery optimizations. Please add MyPowerSpy to the exemption list in the phone\'s system settings.
This mode must access your location. Please enable the phone\'s location services and restart the recording.
"For this app to work, it must access your location. Please change the app\'s permissions in the phone\'s system settings."
Collects all data on one phone. Please do not lock the phone or leave the app.
Run each of the following modes on one phone.
Logs battery consumption while sending data.
Logs the phone\'s location, received signal strength and the currently connected cell tower. Please do not lock the phone or leave the app.
